content:
a 1922 designer by ann orr recharted by christine anderson 2001
**approximate finished sizes ** * using crochet cotton size 5 width = 15 5 inches height = 15 2 inches * using crochet cotton size 10 width 12 9 inches height = 12 0 inches * using crochet cotton size 20 width = 12 3 inches height = 11 5 inches * using crochet cotton size 30 width = 11 8 inches height = 11 0 inches
